mapper.select: SELECT u.firstname as firstname, u.lastname as lastname, u.email as email, u.phone as phone, n.name as neighbour, a.street as street, a.number as number, a.reference as reference FROM `user` u, `address` a, `neighbour` n WHERE u.user_id=1 AND u.address_id=a.address_id AND a.neighbour_id=n.neighbour_id AND u.tx_status=1 AND a.tx_status=1 AND n.tx_status=1
SELECT o.order_id as orderId, o.date as date, o.state as state FROM `order` o WHERE o.user_id=#{userId}
